mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_ID FROM KKATOK.CHATROOMPARTICIPATE WHERE USER_ID = #{my_id} INTERSECT SELECT CHAT_ID FROM KKATOK.CHATROOMPARTICIPATE WHERE USER_ID = #{friend_id}
SELECT USER_ID , CHAT_MESSAGE , TO_CHAR(CHAT_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CHAT_REGDATE FROM KKATOK.CHATINFO c WHERE CHAT_ID = #{chat_id} ORDER BY CHAT_REGDATE

SELECT c.CHAT_ID, C2.USER_ID, c.CHAT_MESSAGE, C.CHAT_REGDATE FROM KKATOK.CHATINFO c INNER JOIN (SELECT CHAT_ID ,USER_ID FROM KKATOK.CHATROOMPARTICIPATE c2 WHERE CHAT_ID IN (SELECT CHAT_ID FROM KKATOK.CHATROOMPARTICIPATE c WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}) AND C2.USER_ID != #{user_id})C2 ON c2.CHAT_ID = c.CHAT_ID WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY CHAT_REGDATE DESC
